title: shvEtAraNyEshvaram
sahitya:
shvEtAraNyEshvaram bhajEham sadA brahma vidyA nAyakI samEtam


anupallavi

 vEdAgama vinuta vaibhavam vidhi guruguha sannuta prabhAvam


caraNam   shvEtAraNya kSEtra vilasitam shvEtAmbarAdi dharam suranatam 
bhUtAdi sEvitam shankaram shashidharam bhikSATana vESadharam
